name: Planet R-12
description: "Planet R-12" is a 2D tactical shooter. Your squad of persistent soldiers accidently landed on a planet of robots, populated by hostile mechanisms and war machines. Each step on a planet is full of dangers and soldiers really need your skills and abilities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 (32 bit or 64 bit) Processor: 1.6Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB graphics card Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Kill robots to get NEW WEAPONS!! The game is fun and all but due to the monsters being too strong it kinda takes away from the game but not a lot.  Pros Steam achievements and trading cards can take controll of 3 different people choose your weapons Each character has an ability  cons monsters are too tough
